ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars

(OOC: I thought we were under attack, too, so scratch my last post 
EXCEPT for the part about Octociz and Bronco. That really happened.)


Vulois/Terminess/Bronco(with Octociz)

 Before Vulois left to find Hell Beast, he readioed in to Battera and 
Soundwave.

"Hey, come on! If you don't hurry up Hell Beast will thin I'm faking 
and will kill us all! Make Battera a TM3 and  bring the driver here."

Vulois found Hell Beast again.

"So, about what I said before. Terminess is brilliant! All the needs 
is a tiny lab to work on things. How about it?"

______________________________________________________________________

Terminess, without her lab yet, had no particular thing to work on. 
She decided that she should work on strengthening the shields and 
auto-guns incase of attack. She left immendiatly for the control room.

______________________________________________________________________
 

Bronco, staring at an unconsious Octociz, radiod back in to the 
Maximal base.

"I'm serious Maximals! You have 4 mega-cycles left or Octociz gets 
it. Meet me at the cliff where the Axalon fell intot the sea, or 
you'll be down one more Maximal!"
